# Horizontal bar plot for variable importance

This chapter demonstrates how to make horizontal bar plot to visualize variable
importance, possibly with uncertainty intervals. Similar to 
`ShapleyVIC::draw_bars()`, but now with flexible x-axis title.

```{r, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.width = 6, fig.height = 6)
```

```{r}
data(df_compas_shapley_vic, package = "ShapleyVIC")
head(df_compas_shapley_vic)
library(magrittr)
library(ggplot2)
df_bars <- df_compas_shapley_vic %$% ShapleyVIC::summarise_shapley_vic(
  val = shapley_vic_val, val_sd = sage_sd, var_names = var_names
)
df_bars %$% Figures::draw_bars(
  val = val, var_names = Variable, x_lab = "ShapleyVIC values"
) + theme(text = element_text(size = 14))
```
